All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AircraftCarrier
This class creates an object representing an aircraft carrier with corresponding name and size of 5
Battleship
This class creates an object representing a battleship with corresponding name and size of 4
BattleshipGame
This class handles the creation and updating of the two boards along with getting the CPU's move
BattleshipGUI
This class controls the GUI for the entire game by handling the switching from different views.
BattleshipStrategy
 
Board
This class holds the 8x8 grid of GridPoint objects
ComputerPlayer
 
Destroyer
This class creates an object representing a destroyer with corresponding name and size of 3
GameView
This class handles the display of the player and CPU boards and the switching from player to CPU moves.
GridPoint
 
Gunboat
This class creates an object representing a gunboat with corresponding name and size of 2
HardAI
 
MainMenuView
This class represents the main menu of the game with a difficulty setting selection and game mode selection Notable: extends BorderPane so switching views is easier Notable: implements Observer to update the view when switched
Observable
 
Observer
Interface for an update method for Observable objects
RandomAI
 
Ship
This Superclass hold the methods and instance variables of all ships Allows for an array of type Ship to better organize code
ShipPlacement
This class stores the starting values of each ship to be able to place images on the board when game is loaded
ShipSelectorView
This class creates the ship selector, where the user will set up the location and orientation of each ship
SongPlayer
 
SongPlayerQueue
 
Submarine
This class creates an object representing a submarine with corresponding name and size of 3
